name: Curro Jimenez
overview: Curro Jiménez is a videogame of shots realized by the equipment of development Arcadia, published under the seal of the company Zigurat in Spain in the year 1989. Inspired in the televising series homonymous, Curro Jiménez, the bandolero protagonist, must face the French troops That occupy Spain. The character moves on foot or on horseback in the early stages, killing French soldiers while making dynamite cartridges, since the ultimate goal of the game is to bomb a French camp from the air, using a balloon and dynamite in advance Collected.
